channel.title: Barry Sonnenfeld on jverkamp.com

item.title: Men in Black 3
item.description: I really liked the first two Men in Black movies. They’re a the sort of fun that I end up re-watching around once a year as a sort of guilty pleasure. I was a little surprised that they decided to make a third one, but I think it worked out well enough.
